description: Here's what you might have missed Friday on CNN.
title: Quickly catch up on the day's news
title_page: News today: Corona beer, Brooke Baldwin, Bill Withers - CNN
maintext:
(CNN) Here's what you might have missed Friday on CNN:
-- Top Trump administration officials said last year the threat of a pandemic kept them up at night.
-- CNN anchor Brooke Baldiwn has tested positive for coronavirus.
-- There are faint glimmers that the situation is improving in the area where the US coronavirus outbreak first took hold.
-- The American economy lost more jobs than it gained for the first time in a decade.
